title._content: Image taken from page 9 of 'The State of Michigan: embracing sketches of its history, position, resources and industries. Compiled ... by S. B. McCracken. [With plates and a map.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The State of Michigan: embracing sketches of its history, position, resources and industries. Compiled ... by S. B. McCracken. [With plates and a map.]", "Miscellaneous Official Publications" Contributor: MACCRACKEN, Stephen Bromley. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010410.eee.34." Page: 9 Place of Publishing: Lansing Date of Publishing: 1876 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002484198 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
